name: Creat Shift4Shop products from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new product in Shift4Shop. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1A8zzaHpJSz1lwZuXtqN5SJyKd9AOK6oxKDEUgepn6SY/edit?usp=sharing).
